page.title: 16MOLE CATCHERS
page.content: Mole catchers in Chester Moor are very busy in the high season.Moles are very vicious creatures.They are web-footed with small,but very sharp teeth.Mole catching in Chester Moor started in 1950.In those days the traps were two old pence for ten and were very strong.Trappers poison lawns and set the traps up near the holes with a little bit of bait.The local mole catcher,as a young lad,caught rabbits and from this his interest grew.Local people first asked him to rid their land of moles and since then he has regularly helped out in the neighbourhood.
